commentList.body:
BOT: 👋 Hello, عمر عصام احمد عثمان جادو
BOT: Please choose the language you prefer to continue 

USER: Selected: English

BOT: Please select one of the common topics below, or ask me a short question.

USER: SUPPORT TICKET

BOT: You may check your ticket status by logging in with your registered OKX email/phone.
BOT: https://www.okx.com/support-center/history

USER: CREATE A NEW TICKET

BOT: You may check your ticket status by logging in with your registered OKX email/phone.
BOT: https://www.okx.com/support-center/history

USER: customer support

BOT: Please try to ask questions one more time 😊 or select a topic below:

USER: Ask something else

BOT: Got it! Please share with me your inquiry. I would do my best to help you.

USER: I need  to talk to a human

BOT: Below are the top 10 popular topics you might be interested in, please see if they are of any help 😇


USER: I want to reset/remove authenticator app

BOT: ❗️Note: To secure your assets, you won’t be able to withdraw any funds within 24 hours after changing your authenticator app.
BOT: You can now edit Authenticator app through our self-service portal in minutes!
BOT: 

USER: Create a ticket

BOT: To resolve your inquiry, we will get one of our customer service specialists to look into it. Let's submit a ticket for further assistance 😃
BOT: Before that, have you submitted a ticket previously for the same issue?

USER: Selected: No


SUMMARY: CREATE A NEW TICKET. I need  to talk to a human.
